Class AndroidSdk

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Represents an Android SDK.
    Author:
    hugo.josefson@jayway.com, Manfred Moser

      • getAndroidJar

        public File getAndroidJar()
                   throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Resolves the android.jar from this SDK.
        Returns:
        a File pointing to the android.jar file.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if the file can not be resolved.

      • getSdkPath

        public File getSdkPath()
                throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Resolves the path for this SDK.
        Returns:
        a File pointing to the SDk Directory.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if the file can not be resolved.

      • getPlatform

        public File getPlatform()
        This method returns the previously specified version. However, if none have been specified it returns the "latest" version.
